page.title: 06MILVERTON SCHOOL BUS
page.content:
THERE ARE TWO BUS SERVICES THAT TAKE PEOPLE TO MILVERTON SCHOOL. ONE STARTS AT BAGBOROUGH, THEN BISHOPS LYDEARD, ASH PRIORS, HALSE AND HILLS COTTAGES. IT CONTINUES TO FITZHEAD AND MILVERTON, AND THEN GOES BACK TO BAGBOROUGH BUS STATION. THE SECOND BUS STARTS AT ASHBRITTLE AND THEN GOES TO KITTISFORD BARTON, BATHEALTON, SCREEDY FARM AND MILVERTON. ALTOGETHER THIRTY-FOUR CHILDREN OUT OF ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTY-TWO USE ONE OF THE SCHOOL BUSES. ELEVEN CHILDREN SAID THAT PEOPLE ON THE BUS BULLIED THEM TOO MUCH.
AT OAKE SCHOOL FOURTEEN CHILDREN OUT OF THIRTY-SIX RELY ON THE SCHOOL BUS. SEVEN PEOPLE GO ON THE MINI BUS, AND SEVEN PEOPLE GO ON THE COACH. THERE ARE NO PUBLIC BUSES THROUGH OAKE VILLAGE.
